verses.verse: Then <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered,<s%>
<S%H3863>"Oh<s%> that my <S%H9213>vexation<s%> were <S%H8254>actually<s%> <S%H8254>weighed,<s%> And <S%H5375>laid<s%> in the <S%H3976>balances<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> with my <S%H1942>iniquity!<s%>

"For <S%H6258>then<s%> it would be <S%H3513>heavier<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas,<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> have <S%H9236>been<s%> <S%H9236>rash.<s%>

"For the <S%H2671>arrows<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> are <S%H5973>within<s%> me; Their <S%H2534>poison<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H8354>drinks;<s%> The <S%H1161>terrors<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> are <S%H6186>arrayed<s%> against me.

"Does the <S%H6501>wild<s%> <S%H6501>donkey<s%> <S%H5101>bray<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> [his] <S%H1877>grass,<s%> <S%H518>Or<s%> does the <S%H7794>ox<s%> <S%H1600>low<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> his <S%H1098>fodder<s%>?

"Can <S%H8602>something<s%> <S%H8602>tasteless<s%> be <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H1097>without<s%> <S%H4417>salt,<s%> <S%H518>Or<s%> is <S%H3426>there<s%> <S%H3426>any<s%> <S%H2940>taste<s%> in the <S%H2495>white<s%> of an <S%H2495>egg<s%>?
"My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3985>refuses<s%> to <S%H5060>touch<s%> [them;] They are like <S%H1741>loathsome<s%> <S%H3899>food<s%> to me.
<S%H4310>"Oh<s%> <S%H5414><s%> that my <S%H7596>request<s%> might <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H935>pass,<s%> And that <S%H433>God<s%> would <S%H5414>grant<s%> my <S%H8615>longing!<s%>
"Would that <S%H433>God<s%> were <S%H2974>willing<s%> to <S%H1792>crush<s%> me; That He would <S%H5425>loose<s%> His <S%H3027>hand<s%> and <S%H1214>cut<s%> me <S%H1214>off!<s%>

"But it is <S%H5750>still<s%> my <S%H5165>consolation,<s%> And I <S%H5539>rejoice<s%> in <S%H3808>unsparing<s%> <S%H2550><s%> <S%H9133>pain,<s%> That I have not <S%H3582>denied<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One.<s%>
<S%H4100>"What<s%> is my <S%H3581>strength,<s%> that I should <S%H3176>wait<s%>? And <S%H4100>what<s%> is my <S%H7093>end,<s%> that I should <S%H748>endure<s%> <S%H5315><s%>?
"Is my <S%H3581>strength<s%> the <S%H3581>strength<s%> of <S%H68>stones,<s%> <S%H518>Or<s%> is my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H5153>bronze<s%>?
"Is it that my <S%H5833>help<s%> is not within me, And that <S%H8454>deliverance<s%> is <S%H5080>driven<s%> from me?

"For the <S%H4523>despairing<s%> <S%H4523>man<s%> [there should be] <S%H2617>kindness<s%> from his <S%H7453>friend;<s%> Lest he <S%H5800>forsake<s%> the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty.<s%>
"My <S%H251>brothers<s%> have <S%H898>acted<s%> <S%H898>deceitfully<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> a <S%H5158>wadi,<s%> Like the <S%H650>torrents<s%> of <S%H5158>wadis<s%> which <S%H5674>vanish,<s%>
Which are <S%H6937>turbid<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> of <S%H7140>ice,<s%> [And] into which the <S%H7950>snow<s%> <S%H5956>melts.<s%>
<S%H6256>"When<s%> they <S%H2215>become<s%> <S%H2215>waterless,<s%> they are <S%H6789>silent,<s%> When it is <S%H2552>hot,<s%> they <S%H1846>vanish<s%> from their <S%H4725>place.<s%>
"The <S%H734>paths<s%> of their <S%H1870>course<s%> <S%H3943>wind<s%> <S%H3943>along,<s%> They <S%H5927>go<s%> up into <S%H8414>nothing<s%> and perish.
"The <S%H734>caravans<s%> of <S%H8485>Tema<s%> <S%H5027>looked,<s%> The <S%H1979>travelers<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> <S%H6960>hoped<s%> for them.
"They were <S%H954>disappointed<s%> for they had <S%H982>trusted,<s%> They <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5704>there<s%> and were <S%H2659>confounded.<s%>
<S%H3588>"Indeed,<s%> you have <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H3808>such,<s%> You <S%H7200>see<s%> a <S%H2866>terror<s%> and are <S%H3372>afraid.<s%>
"Have I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3051>'Give<s%> me [something,'] Or, <S%H7809>'Offer<s%> a <S%H7809>bribe<s%> for me from your <S%H3581>wealth,<s%>'
Or, <S%H4422>'Deliver<s%> me from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6862>adversary,<s%>' Or, <S%H6299>'Redeem<s%> me from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6184>tyrants<s%>'?
<S%H3384>"Teach<s%> me, and I will be <S%H2790>silent;<s%> And <S%H995>show<s%> me <S%H4100>how<s%> I have <S%H7686>erred.<s%>
<S%H4100>"How<s%> <S%H4834>painful<s%> are <S%H3476>honest<s%> <S%H561>words!<s%> But <S%H4100>what<s%> does your <S%H3198>argument<s%> <S%H3198>prove<s%>?
"Do you <S%H2803>intend<s%> to <S%H3198>reprove<s%> [my] <S%H561>words,<s%> When the <S%H4405>words<s%> of one in <S%H2976>despair<s%> belong to the <S%H7307>wind<s%>?
"You would <S%H637>even<s%> <S%H5307>cast<s%> [lots] for the <S%H3490>orphans,<s%> And <S%H3739>barter<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> your <S%H7453>friend.<s%>
"And <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H2974>please<s%> <S%H6437>look<s%> at me, And [see] <S%H518>if<s%> I <S%H3576>lie<s%> to your <S%H6440>face.<s%>
<S%H7725>"Desist<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> let there be <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H9390>injustice;<s%> Even <S%H7725>desist,<s%> my <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> is <S%H5750>yet<s%> in it.
"Is <S%H3426>there<s%> <S%H9390>injustice<s%> on my <S%H3956>tongue<s%>? <S%H3808>Cannot<s%> my <S%H2441>palate<s%> <S%H995>discern<s%> <S%H1942>calamities<s%>?
